item.title: Spectrum Addict: Load "FILM 2" Kickstarter
item.description:
The Kickstarter for a follow up to the “Memoirs of a Spectrum Addict” documentary, “Load ‘FILM 2’ has entered its final week. The line up of Speccy developers is impressive, including the likes of my old boss Jon Ritman and Bo Jangeborg. As someone who was obsessed by Delta4’s adventure games back in the day, I’m particularly pleased to see Fergus McNeil in there as well.

These documentaries are clearly a labour of love for Andy and I strongly believe that we need to be capturing the stories of these pioneers, so I really hope this funds.

item.title: Kickstarter for a Bluetooth Speccy
item.description: This draft Kickstarter campaign for a Bluetooth ZX Spectrum could be interesting. My old 48K only has a partially function keyboard (I really should get around to getting a new keyboard membrane for it), and Elite’s emulation on iOS is generally pretty good so this could be a good way to get a more authentic Speccy experience. I certainly hope that it will be useable as a standard Bluetooth keyboard so other emulators (e.g. Spectaculator) can support it.
